column4: Trial identifier used by lead organization, ie. Center for Experimental Therapeutics Program (CTEP) ID or Industry Sponsored ID.  This is usually a short identifier. Example: E4412.
Indicates what site is filling out the assay.
Method used for enriching for mRNA.
Vendor for the bait set used for enrichment, e.g. Twist, Agilent, IDT.
Sequencer Model, e.g. HiSeq 2500, NextSeq, NovaSeq.
Indicates if the sequencing was performed paired or single ended.
Specimen identifier assigned by the CIMAC-CIDC Network. Formatted as C????????.??
Path to a file on a user's computer.
